common.confirm_delete_scale: Delete this scale and all its items/responses?
common.confirm_delete_item: Delete this item and its responses?
common.confirm_delete_responses: Delete ALL responses for this scale? This cannot be undone.
common.admin_sub: Create surveys, manage items, export data

survey.title: Survey
survey.consent_collect: What we collect: your responses (and optional email if provided).
survey.consent_use: How we use: academic research and aggregate statistics only.
survey.consent_retention: Retention: limited duration; you may request deletion.
survey.sec_purpose_body: This research aims to collect survey responses for academic analysis.
survey.sec_risk_body: Minimal risk is expected. You may skip any question you feel uncomfortable with.
survey.sec_withdrawal_body: You may withdraw at any time. Submitted data can be deleted using self‑service links.
survey.sec_datause_body: Data is used for academic research and aggregate statistics only.
survey.sec_anonymity_body: No direct identifiers are collected unless you choose to provide them.
survey.sec_contact_body: For questions, please contact the research team.

consent_opt.recording: I consent to audio/video recording where applicable
consent_opt.withdrawal: I understand I can withdraw at any time
consent_opt.data_use: I understand my data is for academic/aggregate use only

survey.security_badges: Security: encrypted at rest, end‑to‑end encryption supported; designed for GDPR/PDPA compliance.

common.self_manage_hint: Export or delete your submission at any time using the links below. Keep them safe.
common.consent_hint: Optional, leave blank to use default consent text. Newlines preserved.
common.admin_console_sub: Publish surveys · Manage items · Export data

ai.steps: Steps: 1) Configure provider, 2) Pick target languages, 3) Preview, 4) Apply.
ai.review: Review translations and click Apply to save into item stems.
ai.not_ready: Provider not configured or external AI disabled. Set API key and enable external AI in Provider Settings.

common.share_desc: Share this URL with participants to answer the survey directly.

e2ee.title: End‑to‑end Encryption
e2ee.desc: Encrypt answers in the browser. The server only stores ciphertext and cannot read your content.
e2ee.disable_confirm_title: Turn OFF E2EE? This exposes responses to server‑side processing.
e2ee.disable_confirm_second: Are you absolutely sure? This action will be audited.
e2ee.region_strong: Warning: For GDPR/PIPL projects, E2EE is strongly recommended.
e2ee.region_soft: Note: Consider enabling E2EE for better privacy.
e2ee.enabled_hint: E2EE is ON. Only registered recipients with project keys can decrypt.
e2ee.project_keys_readonly: Registered recipients (read‑only). Keys are set at creation.
e2ee.export_bundle_desc: Contains: manifest (version, type, scale_id, count, created_at) + Ed25519 signature + encrypted responses. For archival and offline decryption.
e2ee.export_ready: Export link prepared (opened in new tab).
e2ee.local_export_desc: Local plaintext export decrypts in your browser (private key never leaves your device). Default format: JSONL.
e2ee.passphrase_help: Used to encrypt/unlock your private key in the browser. Never sent to the server. Use a strong passphrase and store it safely.
e2ee.pub_auto_note: Public key is generated and uploaded automatically when you click Create.
e2ee.pub_placeholder: Paste base64 (x25519 raw) or PEM SPKI (RSA)
e2ee.key_loss_warning: Warning: Private key never leaves your device. Losing it means your data is permanently unrecoverable.
e2ee.csv_notice: Note: Server-side CSV exports (long/wide/score) are available only when E2EE is OFF. When E2EE is ON, plaintext stays local; convert JSONL to CSV using your analysis tools.
e2ee.analytics_notice: When E2EE is ON, advanced analytics (e.g., histograms, Cronbach's alpha) are unavailable on the server; only basic counts may be shown. Use local plaintext export for analysis.
e2ee.import_priv_desc: Select the previously downloaded JSON key file. It will be stored in this browser only (never uploaded). Use your passphrase to unlock.
e2ee.import_ok: Key imported and stored locally. Not uploaded.

cookie.title: Cookies
cookie.desc: We use necessary cookies to run the site. You can opt in to analytics or third‑party cookies. This service uses Cloudflare CDN for performance and security.

hero.title: Psychology research, from surveys to insights.
hero.subtitle: Synap is built for psychology and social sciences — collect, analyze, and export your study data with ease.

why.research: Research-focused: Designed for psychology and social science studies.
why.stats: Instant stats: Track responses in real-time with quick descriptive analysis.
why.privacy: Privacy & compliance: Fully aligned with GDPR and PDPA standards to safeguard participant data.

use.edu: Educational research: classroom studies and learning feedback

use.social: Social research: attitudes, cognition, and behavior studies

export.v: CSV/Excel for SPSS, R, JASP compatibility

i18n.v: Ideal for cross-cultural and international studies

cred.title: A survey platform built for research

rigorous.v: Compatible with formats and workflows used in academia

reliable.v: Encrypted storage, aligned with research ethics

global.v: Designed for cross-language and cross-cultural studies

cta.title: Launch your next psychology study today.

footer.copyright: © 2025 Synap. Data protection compliant with GDPR & PDPA.

privacy.title: Privacy & Compliance
privacy.server: Our servers and databases are primarily located in Singapore, where personal data is stored and processed.
privacy.cdn: To improve global performance, we use Cloudflare for content delivery and edge caching. User requests may pass through Cloudflare’s edge nodes during transmission, but actual survey data is stored only in our Singapore servers and not retained at the edge.
privacy.metadata: Cloudflare may temporarily process limited network metadata (such as IP addresses) for routing and security, and it is not used for advertising or any unauthorized purposes.
privacy.assure: We ensure this processing remains compliant with GDPR (EU General Data Protection Regulation) and PDPA (Singapore Personal Data Protection Act).
privacy.dpa: Cloudflare acts as our data processor under a DPA.
privacy.learn_more: Learn more in our Privacy Policy

common.title: Synap — Cyber Survey
common.tagline: Neon vibes · subtle chaos · focused research
